long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Timestamp bookmark a YouTube video at any point during the video by pressing the blue button. This extension will remember what time you saved the bookmark and you can jump to that point at any time you wish. Save as many timestamped bookmakers as you want. This is a great tool when you are presenting a video and when you are needing to jump around to certain points.
